title: CANDY 225 L Direct Cool Single Door 2 Star Refrigerator  (Moon Silver, CSD2252MS)

product_specification.Other Performance Features: Turbo Icing Technology, Large Space, Stabilizer Free Operation
product_specification.Other Power Features: Easy Cooling Control Know for Different Cooling Requirements.
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years on Compressor
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic, Glassware, Bulb or Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature Made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects due to Cause Beyond Control like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchaser's Residence

product_description.Fast Ice Making Technology: The Candy 225 L refrigerator is equipped with a Turbo Icing technology that allows your appliance to accelerate the time needed for freezing the products. As a result, you can get fast ice making.
product_description.Massive Storage Space: Thanks to the spacious interior space, you can efficiently store all your fresh vegetables, greens, and fruits for an extended period in this refrigerator.

The design of this fridge is very impressive. Quality wise best. Quick delivery and delivery boys were very polite and professional as they delivered my order on Top floor. Installation done on same day and engineers was also very cooperative. Overall Good👍Go for it

Getting a good and spacious refrigerator at a very reasonable price is quite rare, but Candy has met our requirements. Would have given 5 star, but frosting is a frequent issue and to avoid it, I have to defrost it 2-3 times in a week. Also opening the ice door becomes quite difficult at times due to the fear of breaking it. Apart from that, overall performance and cooling of the refigerator is very good.

Posting this after using the refrigerator for five months. I thought I was gambling with the money since this is a new brand in India. It turned out to be a very good product. Works amazingly. Go for it if you're looking for a budget fridge. There are some cons. The plastic inside the fridge is of poor quality so handle with care. The gasket on the door is likely to be faulty. You will have to fix that if it doesn't close properly. It's wobbly, you'll have to get a stand or shove thermocol underneath it at the back.And the most annoying this is ice accumulating in the freezer all the time making it hard to close the freezer door. You have to defrost it every three or four days. Still a decent purchase. I recommend it.
